Message.Title: Stock down 2% in Europe
Message.Msg: Somebody knows that the Icahn deal is NOT an offer to buy the company, rather just another re-capitalization/giant dividend plan.

Message.Title: Leak of massive miss of earnings
Message.Msg: Icahn realizes that all projections in his proposal are instantly invalid. Including Dell issuing 4B in debt. Who would even lend them the money at less than 6%? Business in decline, eventually Dell will be unprofitable.
This is a miss by HALF. 40 cents expected, 20 cents delivered. If there were no offers on the table for Dell, the stock would be at 7 as a result of this news.

Message.Title: As Dell's business declines, Michael Dell's offer seems generous
Message.Msg: Even excessive. If he had waited two quarters to make this offer, his offer could have been 10 and it would be accepted.

Topic.Title: Why is this POS not tanking?

Message.Msg: #$%$ ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? Doesn't matter what their numbers are. They have a buyout of AT LEAST 13.65. It is only 2 months away so the stock should never go below 13.30 this close to the buyout. Ichan is a #$%$.... he should of offered 13.65 Plus a $1 stub. F Ichan. Let it play out at 13.65. you can sell weekly puts at 13.50 for the next 8 weeks and make another .40.

Topic.Title: Why is this POS not tanking?

Message.Msg: Nicely said sir, nicely said. Want to make a few more bucks, sell some leaps. The Jan 2015 15 calls sell for 35 cents. Those expire at zero in a few short months.

Topic.Title: As Dell's business declines, Michael Dell's offer seems generous

Message.Msg: yes, this is exactly what he plans to do with early earning release: poison pill plus Michael Dell is buying HP shares in case his deal doesn't fly

Message.Title: Michael Dell wants this stock to tank
Message.Msg: so he can buy our cheap shares plus he is buying HP shares as well to hedge his batting average currently at 0.139 sit tight no matter what the earning is

Topic.Title: The DELLusional Are Hoping for a Few More Pennies by Holding for Another 7 Months

Message.Msg: Actually dell is experiencing a resurgent number of customers waiting for dell precision laptops equipped with win 7 professional instead of win 8... Wird has gotten out that if you are in business and want to keep your network up and running beyond april 2014 without mr softee.. You can and as much as we have invested it better continue to work... Just don't accept any msoft updates..starting march 2014... Cause you know they will want to crimp your system to force you to buy up... Aint gonna happen.. If dell knows whats good for them they will keep making laptops with redhat linux cause there may be a huge influx in 2014..
